EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Creating a PageRank Analytics Platform Using Spring Boot Micros
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Creating a PageRank Analytics Platform Using Spring Boot Microservices
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar Creating a PageRank Analytics Platform Using Spring Boot Microservices on Thursday, January 28, 2016.
Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, January 28, 2016 Time: 10:00AM PST
Join the Session <[[http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1120732/FC3B804327595D17B4D0F7D94158FA0F]]> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
We look forward to you joining us!
